articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Ri Po Ik
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Ri Po Ik, an ardent patriotic fighter, in Mangyongdae on Monday on the occasion of the 134th anniversary of her birth.
					Seen before her grave was a wreath from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The wreath-laying ceremony was attended by Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and others, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before her grave were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, ministries, national institutions, military academies, educational and media institutions and party and power organs and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Ri Po Ik, looking back on the brilliant life of Ri who made sure that the tradition of the Mangyongdae family was steadily inherited by its members and devoted her all to the liberation and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Patriotic Life of Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Patriotic Life of Ri Po Ik
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Today is the 134th birth anniversary of Ri Po Ik, grandmother of President Kim Il Sung who was an ardent patriot and anti-Japanese fighter.
					 In his reminiscences "With the Century" the President says, "My grandfather and grandmother were old country people who knew nothing but farming. But truth to tell, I marveled at their firm revolutionary spirit and was greatly inspired by it".
					
					 She encouraged all the family members to take part in revolutionary activities for the country and nation, not just for the happiness of her family, with a steadfast faith.
					
					 When her son Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and founder of the Korean National Association, passed away, she did not yield to sorrow.
					
					 She told the President that he should devote himself to the struggle for national independence, continuing what his father had done, though he could not to take care of her and his mother.
					
					 It is her disposition not to bow to any pressure and tolerate any injustice.
					
					 She never gave up her firm conviction and principles when she was taken hostage by the Japanese imperialists to make the President surrender.
					
					 Whenever she got news that the Korean People's Revolutionary Army won a battle, she shouted in high spirits before the enemy, "My grandson is great. I hope he will crush all the Japanese imperialists on our land!"
					
					 Though she had neither regular education nor revolutionary cultivation, she could stand against enemies in defiance of hard trials and difficulties because she had a strong belief in the victory in the Korean revolution guided by the President.
					
					 Even after the liberation of the country, she continued farming until she died although she was the grandmother of the head of the state.

articles.title: World No-Tobacco Day Observed
articles.content:
World No-Tobacco Day Observed
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- An event was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to observe the World No-Tobacco Day.
					 Present there were officials in the field of public health, those of ministries and national institutions, working people in the city of Pyongyang and staff members of the mission of the WHO here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Speakers said at the event that the World No-Tobacco Day marks an occasion of increasing social concern for the issues arising in no-tobacco activities now under way world-wide.
					
					 They stressed that the WHO should protect the health of women from tobacco, as required by the theme set by it on the occasion of the World No-Tobacco Day this year, to help them make a positive contribution to social development.
					
					 A lecture "Trend of world no-tobacco activities and measures to prevent passive smoking" was given there.
					
					 Its participants went round the Tobacco Substitutes Exhibition.

articles.title: Nonsmoking Campaign Encouraged
articles.content:
Nonsmoking Campaign Encouraged
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The nonsmoking campaign has been intensified in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 After a tobacco control law was enacted in the country some time ago, extensive activities have been conducted to put it into force.
					
					 The Korean Tobacco Association was organized in the country to take measures for properly carrying out the state policies concerning tobacco production, joint venture, collaboration, bonded processing, import, export and sale.
					
					 Smoking is prohibited in theatres, cinema houses, schools, hospitals, sidewalks, stops, traffic means and other public places and violators are exposed to legal sanctions.
					
					 Health institutions and mass media have introduced the harmful effect of tobacco on health, environmental protection and economic development in varied forms and methods.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Tobacco Substitutes Exhibition in Sosong District, Pyongyang, has been visited by many people.
					
					 The exhibition informs the visitors of the harmfulness and aftereffect of tobacco with videos and printed matters for propaganda. It also provides them with tobacco substitutes and tonics such as nutritive pills, chewing gum and tobacco filter.
					
					 On the World No Tobacco Day, May 31, Ri Yon Ok, chief of the exhibition, told KCNA that many people have quitted smoking with the help of the exhibition. We will produce many goods helping people quit smoking and expand the scientific and technical exchange with many countries encouraging nonsmoking, she added.
					
					 To mark the day diversified activities have been conducted in the country such as a symposium on measures to protect people from passive smoking. -0-

articles.title: DPRK Women's Football Team Qualified for World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Football Team Qualified for World Cup
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's football team finished runner-up in the AFC Women's Asian Cup 2010, thus qualifying for the 2011 Women's World Cup to be held in Germany.
					 The May 30 finals between the DPRK and Australian teams ended with a penalty kick following 1-1 draw.

articles.title: US, Japan Accused of Supporting S. Korea
articles.content:
US, Japan Accused of Supporting S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are vehemently denouncing the U.S. and Japanese authorities for supporting the Lee Myung Bak regime over the warship "Cheonan" incident and aggravating the already acute situation on the Korean peninsula.
					 Kim Hung Ju, 61, a department director in the State Resources Development Guidance Bureau, said in an interview with KCNA that as soon as the incident occurred, the U.S. imperialists asserted the DPRK was involved in it, instigating the south Korean puppets to acts hostile towards the DPRK.
					
					 The United States voiced support to the "investigation results" on the incident announced by the south Korean authorities and a "statement to the people" made public by Lee, he said, and went on:
					
					 The fact reveals the U.S. intention to further intensify the anti-DPRK campaign with the help of its stooges and put the whole of Korea under its control.
					
					 With no amount of trick and military threat can the United States discourage the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Kwang Chol, 50, a chief furnaceman of the Chollima Steel Complex, told KCNA that the United States has backed the south Korean traitors in their fabrication concerning the incident, driving the situation to the brink of war.
					
					 The United States has ordered its forces in south Korea to take a combat posture for another possible war in Korea and stepped up arms buildup and military domination over south Korea, he said, continued:
					
					 With a touch-and-go situation prevailing in the Korean peninsula, the Korean army and people will respond to the enemy's "retaliation" with a stronger retaliation and to their "punishment" with indiscriminate punishment of their own style in order to defend the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Jong Chol Min, 26, a student of Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, told KCNA that Japan has persistently pursued the anti-DPRK policy in league with the south Korean regime, manipulated by the United States. The Japanese militarists will surely be punished by the Korean people for their reckless acts, he added.

articles.title: S. Korean Traitors Accused of Blocking Event
articles.content:
S. Korean Traitors Accused of Blocking Event
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea blocked the event common to the nation marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. This was an unpardonable action against reunification as it dampened the nation's desire for the country's reunification, ignoring the historic significance of the said declaration, and a grave treachery as it was intended to brutally suppress even the non-governmental movement for reunification and bring the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase of a war. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The above-said action taken by the south Korean conservative authorities self-exposed their true colors as traitors who seek confrontation and war in total denial of the said declaration, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet forces are now staging an anti-DPRK smear campaign and working with bloodshot eyes to ignite a war in collusion with outside forces with the sinking of a warship of the puppet navy as a momentum.
					
					  It is a sinister intention of the puppet group to weather its worst ruling crisis by employing such trite trick as groundlessly pulling up fellow countrymen in the run-up to the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and brutally crack down upon the pro-reunification patriotic movement of the south Korean people from all walks of life.

articles.title: S. Korean Policy of Confrontation Bound to Go Bust
articles.content:
S. Korean Policy of Confrontation Bound to Go Bust
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The south Korean conservative ruling forces' confrontation with fellow countrymen is nothing but a last-ditch effort to escape self-destruction. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 In fact, fascist dictatorship can never last long as it is a ruling method employed by those who are fated to go to ruin. 
					
					 The fascist dictatorship enforced in south Korea under the veil of "pragmatism" means that the conservative ruling forces can never maintain their ruling system without brandishing bayonets and their ruling crisis has reached an uncontrollable phase. 
					
					 Much upset by this, the conservative group is seeking a way out of the crisis in confrontation with fellow countrymen and making desperate efforts to escalate the confrontation. 
					
					 The fact that the theory of "principal enemy" advocated in the period of the fascist dictatorship disguised with the word of   "civilian" has been revived in south Korea glaringly indicates the stand and attitude of the present conservative ruling forces' toward fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Keeping in mind the fact that "principal enemy" is the target to be destroyed by use of such military force as a war, the above-said theory has a very grave and serious bearing on the inter-Korean relations. The puppet group's loud-mouthed theory about "principal enemy" is, needless to say, a theory of a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign of the south Korean conservative group strips bare its true colors as traitors and confrontation maniacs.
					
					 It admits of no further argument that the criminal aim of the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket kicked up by the conservative forces in the tundra of human rights is to divert the public resentment at the them and stoke among south Koreans confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north. 
					
					 The group of traitors is getting hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen in a desperate effort to escape its final doom, but it will get the group nowhere.

articles.title: Psychological Warfare of Imperialists under Fire
articles.content:
Psychological Warfare of Imperialists under Fire
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Psychological warfare is the trite method employed by the imperialists for invading and bringing down other countries and putting them under their domination.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Through the above-said warfare the imperialists seek to shake the faith of the peoples of the anti-imperialist and independent countries in their causes, make them harbor an illusion about imperialism and lead them to unconditional surrender and defection, the article notes.
					
					 Citing what happened in various countries of East Europe where decades' old socialism collapsed and in Iraq as examples, the article goes on:
					
					 The psychological warfare of the imperialists can be likened to an invisible dangerous dagger as it is aimed at isolating and stifling the anti-imperialist and independent countries or realizing regime changes there and bringing down their systems.
					
					 Those who have their consciousness of national independence and class benumbed due to the above-said warfare are bound to nurture an illusion about imperialism and non-resistance against it and distrust and betrayal of their cause and system without exception. 
					
					 The imperialists use even a military force as one of the basic means for psychological warfare. Underlying their disturbing military moves such as expansion of military spending, development and deployment of new type WMDs, the expansion and strengthening of military alliances, large-scale war maneuvers involving huge troops is a scenario to put psychological pressure upon the anti-imperialist and independent countries including socialist countries and create horror and unrest among the people and, at the same time, enfeeble them by plugging them into an arms race to achieve their hegemonic purpose with ease. 
					
					 It is part of psychological warfare for the U.S. to occasionally open to media those weapons still at the experimental phase. It goes without saying that this gesture is aimed at striking horror into people and making them yield to the U.S.
					
					 The imperialists are running the whole gamut of propaganda media in a bid to float all kinds of misinformation for the purpose of hiding their acts of aggression and war with the veil of "justice" and, at the same time, creating an illusion about capitalism under the signboard of "cooperation" and "exchange."

articles.title: Full Play to Heroic Spirit of Songun Korea Called for
articles.content:
Full Play to Heroic Spirit of Songun Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday editorially calls upon all the people to more dynamically step up the advance for a great surge in the spirit of wiping out the enemies as required by the prevailing situation and thus decisively frustrate their provocations and war moves and bring about great innovations and leap forward in building a thriving nation.
					 No force on earth can break the will of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to react to the "retaliation" of the enemies with stronger retaliation and to "punishment" with indiscriminate punishment of their style, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The anti-DPRK smear campaign being desperately staged by the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is nothing but an extremely ridiculous farce orchestrated by them to hurt the high dignity and international prestige of the DPRK at any cost, much upset by its ever-increasing might. The U.S. imperialists and their servants have run the whole gamut of despicable plots to realize their aggressive and black-hearted intentions, wantonly violating the dignity and sovereignty of other countries and nations through lies and deception. This trite trick can never work on the DPRK. 
					
					 The more frantic the enemies are getting in their moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, the further it will intensify the drive for a great surge under the uplifted banner of self-reliance to decisively frustrate the enemies' sanctions and blockade and open the gate to a thriving nation without fail. 
					
					 Single-minded unity means the strongest power of the DPRK and an ever-victorious treasured sword. No force on earth can break the single-minded unity of all the servicepersons and people around the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 The Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea is the most powerful and dignified politics for independence against imperialism and genuine patriotic one. 
					
					 Only when all the servicepersons and people single-mindedly remain true to the Songun politics, can they foil the enemies' anti-DPRK smear campaign and dynamically step up the advance for a great surge.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung’s Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung’s Work Observed
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates a signed article to the 24th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Historical Experience of Building the Workers' Party of Korea".
					 The work clarifies the character of the WPK as a revolutionary party of Juche, the fundamental and main principles of party building, the experience gained in consolidating the party organizationally and ideologically and achieving the unity and cohesion of the party and the masses and other ideas and theories.  
					
					It is the firm faith of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to glorify the history and tradition of the building of the revolutionary party of Juche and develop the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung and a genuine mother party, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The wise leadership of Kim Jong Il over the cause of party building of Juche lies in that he has steadily consolidated the WPK organizationally and ideologically, strengthened the unity and cohesion of the party and the people in every way and remarkably increased its leadership role to bring about ceaseless leaping advances and innovations in building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Monolithic ideology and leadership have been perfectly established in the WPK and the ranks of its members have turned into elite ones. All the party members enshrine loyalty to the party as their revolutionary faith, remain true to it and devotedly uphold it politically and ideologically even under the complicated situation and in any adversity and carry through its line and policies unconditionally. This is the true picture of the WPK and herein lies its invincibility.
					
					 The WPK is shedding its rays as a representative and protector of the interests of the Korean people and their true servant. Their support and trust in the party remain unshakable. All of them entirely entrust their destiny and future to the WPK and work hard to put the call of the WPK into practice, going through thick and thin.
					
					 The WPK will always shed its rays as an organizer and a guide for all victories of the Korean people and a powerful political staff for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has glorified the precious history and tradition of building the revolutionary party of Juche under the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Withdrawal of Confrontation Measures Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Withdrawal of Confrontation Measures Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration called a press conference in Seoul on May 25, demanding that the group of traitors withdraw at once the anti-DPRK confrontation measures. 
					 At the press conference the organization noted that the most of the people are skeptical about the several points in the "results of investigation" into the "Cheonan" case by the authorities, charging that the "government" hastily announced the "results of investigation" and is crying out for "tough counteraction".
					
					 It asserted that if the announcement of such clumsy "results" and countermeasures were prompted by the "government's" political tactics to win in the elections by breaking the political deadlock under the pretext of security uneasiness, it deserves judgment by the people.
					
					 It urged the Lee Myung Bak "government" to stop making remarks and actions of aggravating confrontation and fanning up war atmosphere, retract the reckless "countermeasures" and opt for probing the truth behind the case without a shred of doubt.

articles.title: Candlelight Action for Peace Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action for Peace Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Members of different civic and public organizations, personages of opposition parties and citizens of south Korea held a candlelight rally for peace of the Korean Peninsula at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on May 27.
					 Speakers at the rally accused the authorities of misusing the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking for the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and desperately trying to spoil the achievements made after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and bring a war to the peninsula.
					
					 They said that they could hardly repress their anger at the actions of the authorities driving the inter-Korean relations to a crisis with the warship sinking case as a pretext.
					
					 Noting that the people will never be taken in by the authorities' deceptive farce over the case, they called upon all the people to wage fiercer candlelight actions and judge the "Grand National Party" so as to bring peace to the peninsula.

articles.title: US, S. Korean Authorities' Hostile Moves toward DPRK Censured
articles.content:
US, S. Korean Authorities' Hostile Moves toward DPRK Censured
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK released a statement on May 25 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities for their anti-DPRK moves.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges are now engaged in another dangerous move to aggravate the situation and intensify the pressure upon the DPRK under the pretext invented by them.
					
					 The association fully supports the DPRK's independent policy and strongly urges the U.S. and its followers to stop their provocative moves against the DPRK without delay as they may cause the rapid deterioration of the situation not only in the Korean Peninsula but other areas of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The enemies of the DPRK should ponder over the danger of the consequences to be entailed by their adventurous moves.
					
					 The friends of the DPRK the world over will make every possible effort not to allow any actions encroaching upon the sovereignty and independence of the DPRK and the rights of its people.
					
					 On the same day, the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, too, issued a joint statement demanding that the south Korean authorities receive an inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Treachery Condemned
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Treachery Condemned
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Committee under the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on May 28 in denunciation of the treacherous anti-reunification crimes committed by the south Korean puppet authorities by bedeviling the inter-Korean relations. 
					 The statement charged that the present south Korean ruling quarters, displeased with the holding of the event common to the nation to mark the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, tried in every way to break up a meeting of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and working contacts for the preparation of the event and at last totally banned the delegates of the south side from participating in the Pyongyang event. 
					
					 Owing to the south Korean conservative ruling quarters, the precious successes achieved by all the fellow countrymen for 10 years after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration were brought to naught and the touch-and-go situation has been created on the Korean Peninsula in which a war may break out any moment, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The CIS Regional Committee will launch the struggle to disclose and condemn the treacherous and anti-reunification crimes committed by the south Korean authorities by totally denying the joint declaration and driving the inter-Korean relations to the worst phase of war.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Traitorous Actions Denounced
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Traitorous Actions Denounced
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a statement on May 27 in denunciation of the treacherous and anti-reunification actions of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The statement referred to the fact that the Lee Myung Bak regime and anti-reunification conservative forces of south Korea have recently become all the more frantic in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, deliberately linking the sinking case of warship "Cheonan" with the DPRK.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The Lee regime revived the dictatorial rule in south Korea to block inter-Korean dialogue, cooperation and exchange and commit fascist suppression of organizations and personages desirous of national reunification and democracy. It has also made no scruple of doing harm to fellow countrymen in collusion with outside forces, regarding them as "principal enemy".
					
					 The Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration vehemently denounces the crimes committed by the Lee regime by bringing the inter-Korean relations back to those in the Cold War era of confrontation and blocking national reconciliation, unity and reunification as indelible crimes against the nation, the reunification and peace.
					
					 The present reality, in which the nation stands at the crucial historical crossroads of reunification or division and peace or war, urgently requires all the fellow countrymen in the south and the north of Korea and overseas to turn out in the movement for national reunification against all challenges of the separatist forces.
					
					 The Overseas Side Committee will strengthen the solidarity of compatriots from the south, and the north of Korea and overseas and fulfill its mission and role in opening a new phase of national reunification by the concerted efforts of broad overseas compatriots in the spirit of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: DPRK's Principled Stand Backed
articles.content:
DPRK's Principled Stand Backed
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party issued a statement on May 23 in support of the statements of spokesmen for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK. 
					 The BCP Central Committee vehemently denounces the imperialists' propaganda against the DPRK over the sinking case of the warship "Cheonan", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists fabricated the sinking case of a warship of south Korea and launched propaganda campaign for stirring up animosity toward the DPRK in order to find an excuse for invading it, thus seriously violating its sovereignty.
					
					 The government and the people of the DPRK have the legitimate right to defend the sovereignty of their country from the imperialist aggressors.
					
					 The C.C., the BCP extends once again support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people led by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Edmond Jouve, director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, in a statement released on May 25 to support the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK NDC, noted that it is the consistent stand and steadfast principle of the DPRK to react to "sanctions" with retaliation and to "confrontation" with an all-out war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits for Party Building Praised
 Pyongyang, May 31 (KCNA) -- Seminars and lectures were held in Mexico, Thailand and Guinea between May 17 and 24 to commemorate the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, said at a seminar that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung into a powerful party which has perfect guiding idea and achieved steel-like unity and cohesion and a popular party which has stricken its roots deep among the popular masses to be absolutely supported and trusted by them.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's experienced and seasoned leadership the WPK has led to victory the struggle of the Korean people for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and reunifying the country, as an organizer and a guide of all their victories, he said.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, stressed at a lecture that under the leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has developed into a party strong in independent stand and an invincible party which provides dynamic leadership to the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation without making any mistake in its line despite all sorts of trials and difficulties.
					
					 Camano Vitor, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea, said at a lecture that Kim Jong Il, possessed of extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, has led to victory the Korean people with his unique mode of politics.
					
					 Thanks to his leadership the Juche idea has been systematized into an integral whole and developed and enriched, thus providing powerful guidelines which guarantee the victorious advance of the human cause of independence, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the most outstanding leader in the present era as he enjoys absolute trust from all the people, which no other statesmen in the world have ever won.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Ri Po Ik por el dia de su natalicio
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Ri Po Ik por el dia de su natalicio
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 134o aniversario de nacimiento de la ferviente combatiente patriotica Ri Po Ik, tuvo lugar este lunes una ceremonia de homenaje ante su tumba en Mangyongdae.
					Estaba colocada ahi la ofrenda floral enviada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop y otros cuadros, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, ministerios y organos centrales, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del CC del PTC, ministerios, organos centrales academias militares, instituciones de educacion e informacion y de los organismos del partido y el Poder y granjas en la ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la noble vida de Ri Po Ik quien hizo a todos sus familiares mantener con firmeza el linaje de la familia de Mangyongdae y dedico todo lo suyo al cumplimiento de la causa para la liberacion y la prosperidad de la patria.

articles.title: Celebrado en Corea el "Dia Mundial de No Fumar"
articles.content:
Celebrado en Corea el "Dia Mundial de No Fumar"
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 31 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto dedicado al "Dia Mundial de No Fumar".
					A la ocasion asistieron los funcionarios del sector de salud publica, ministerios y organos centrales, trabajadores capitalinos y los miembros de la Representacion de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud en Corea y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que el "Dia Mundial de No Fumar" deviene una oportunidad para elevar la atencion social sobre los problemas presentados en las actividades de no fumar que se libran en escala mundial.
					
					Destacaron que conforme al tema dado por la OMS al "Dia Mundial de No Fumar" de este ano, se debe proteger la salud de las mujeres del tabaquismo, de manera que ellas contribuyan activamente al desarrollo social.
					
					En el acto se impartio la conferencia intitulada "La tendencia de las actividades mundiales de no fumar y las medidas para prevenir la inhalacion indirecta".
					
					Luego, los participantes visitaron la Exposicion Permanente de los Articulos de No Fumar.

articles.title: Equipo coreano se clasifica para la Copa Mundial de 2011 (f)
articles.content:
Equipo coreano se clasifica para la Copa Mundial de 2011 (f)
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ATCC) -- Las futbolistas coreanas obtuvieron el boleto a la Copa Mundial Femenina de 2011 que tendra lugar en Alemania, al ocupar el segundo lugar en la Copa Asiatica Femenina 2010 de la AFC (Confederacion Asiatica de Futbol).
					 En la final del dia 30, el once coreano y el australiano quedaron empatados a uno y tuvieron que decidir la victoria en la loteria de penaltis.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena movimientos belicistas de banda de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena movimientos belicistas de banda de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos entraron ya en la implementacion de su decision de reanudar la "guerra psicologica" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la zona de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					Al respecto, el periodico Rodong Sinmun publico la vispera un comentario individual que sigue:
					
					 Por otra parte, acordaron librar con Estados Unidos en el Mar Oeste de Corea el "ejercicio conjunto antisubmarinos" de maxima dimension y tratan de participar plenamente en el ejercicio para la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" que el imperio desplegara en la segunda mitad de este ano con el objetivo de bloquear militarmente a la RPDC.
					
					  Esto deviene una grave provocacion militar contra la RPDC y una maniobra extremadamente imprudente para desencadenar la guerra agravando al maximo la tension de la Peninsula Coreana creada por el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					
					 La banda de traidores surcoreanos publico el intrigante "resultado de investigacion" que atribuye la causa de hundimiento al "ataque armado del Norte", especificamente, de "torpedo norcoreano" y se esfuerza desesperadamente por hacer creerlo a la opinion publica interna y externa con el fin de procurar el pretexto de provocar la guerra.
					
					  En este contexto, el circulo militar surcoreano decidio reanudar la "guerra psicologica anti-Norte" a lo largo de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar y planea una serie de ejercicios belicos provocativos como los arriba mencionados.
					
					  La realidad demuestra que pasa a la etapa de provocacion de la guerra la campana conflictiva con la RPDC que libra la camarilla surcoreana con el apoyo de las fuerzas extranjeras vinculando absurdamente el incidente con la RPDC y hablando tanto de la "contramedida resuelta" y "represalia".
					
					Los que prefieren el fuego se mueren quemados.
					
					 La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak se convertira en cadaveres abandonados ante el ilimitado e implacable ataque de represalia de la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica "demostracion de fuerza" de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica "demostracion de fuerza" de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, los titeres surcoreanos estan "demostrando sus fuerzas armadas" para hacer creer al mundo que su corbeta "Cheonan" fue hundida por el "ataque de torpedo norcoreano", consolidar la base para su retoma del poder en las "elecciones de autonomia local", justificar e intensificar las maniobras orientadas a provocar la guerra de agresion al Norte.
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 30 y continua:
					
					 La escalada de tales maniobras belicistas traera sin falta la guerra total.
					
					 Esta posibilidad se hizo mas grande cuando los titeres surcoreanos dieron la orden de "hacer frente en el acto a las contingencias" a "juicio del comandante en el terreno".
					
					 Lo grave del caso es que los titeres surcoreanos intentan poner cansada a la RPDC mediante la "demostracion de las fuerzas armadas".
					
					 Los conservadores surcoreanos hablan abiertamente de que tal "demostracion es para hacer que las fuerzas navales del Norte realicen cerca de dos meses el ejercicio de enfrentamiento y parte de la estrategia para el desgaste del combustible, alimentos, municiones y de la fuerza fisica de la comandancia y los soldados del Norte" y que es necesario reproducir el ejercicio militar conjunto "Team Spirit".
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan listos en todos los sentidos para aniquilar de un solo golpe a la banda de Lee Myung Bak y a sus amos yanquis y japoneses aunque ellos se abalancen juntos. He aqui precisamente la causa de que EE.UU. no pudo desatar la guerra todavia si bien esta acechando en todo momento la oportunidad para hacerlo.
					
					 Sin embargo, la muy ignorante e miserable banda de Lee Myung Bak suena ridiculamente con aplastar a la RPDC a traves de la "demostracion de las fuerzas armadas".
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea responderan con un castigo duro a esa maniobra de la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos. Esto no es una advertencia vana.
